data: I am a 2nd year computer science student
on a special integrating studies & full-time job program.
I used to combine my degree with a full-time job in the Prime
Minister's office until this October.
I finished employment for the purpose of dedicate more time to school,
study harder and for searching a relevant student position that can advance me to a high-tech career.
I am looking for a student position in a company that will allow me to study
and develop as a programmer in hope of becoming a permanent employee upon graduation.
I have experience and skills in teamwork as well as military and employment experience as a team leader.
Over the years i haven’t acquired employment experience in the programming field,
but i have acquired abilities and qualities of work ethic,
adaptation to a changing work environment; cool, efficient and effective functioning under pressure.
As well as creative thinking outside the box in a problem-solving approach as well as contending and successfully overcoming crises.

I believe these abilities combined with high motivation to work hard and learn new technologies and practical actions in the industry will enable me to contribute and give value-added to achieving my team goals.

title: Operational • Prime Minister's office
data: • Prime Minister's Office - operations division.
• Planned and lead complex classified projects.
• Participated in classified field work.

title: Combat Officer
data: • Combat officer in the infantry.
• Command and management of 20 soldiers.
• Certificate of Outstanding Officer from the Division Commander
